text:
Does anyone know a good way to sanitize HubSpot output? (hubdb in this case)
```console.log('hubDb', {{ hubdb_table_rows(dynamic_page_hubdb_table_id)|tojson }});```
I'm just trying to log the data, preferably in the form of an object, but I get the error below. It seems to be running into issues with the rich text entries.
It seems to be running into the issue because one of the rich text items has an embed in it and HubSpot isn't escaping it correctly or something. Getting rid of the embeds fixes it.
